info.name: W3Schools Dark Blue
info.description:
A nice simple dark blue theme for W3schools.  I made sure to click around to find all the odd parts that don't color the way you think they should.

Unfortunately some of the UI elements are not CSS, they're HTML.  So I wasn't able to make it super clean like I wanted.

*** no need for my greasemonkey script anymore ***
info.additionalInfo:
2016/08/02:
- fixed some changed elements: topnav, try it windows
2016/01/01:
- images no longer need greasemonkey script

- fixed some elements with gaudy inline styles

- fixed top nav/search bar

- fixed browser icons
- fixed body color
2015/12/07:

- added cleaner images with my new greasemonkey script (see Description)
